name: Type.O Racing
description:
~About~

Created in 48 hours  for Ludum Dare 41!

Theme - "Combine 2 Incomparable Genres"

A combination of classic text-based adventures and high-speed futuristic racing games, Type.O Racing is all about typing like your life (and your vehicle) depends on it!

~Controls~

Simply type one of the coloured prompts and hit Enter!

~Change log~

v1.1
-fixed instant game over bug
-fixed some events never appearing
-added speed indicator
-minor text fixes

v1.0

Released
